resources.string: A shuffled word will be shown on screen and you have to find out the correct word. Each correct answer will reward you 1 point and wrong answer will cost you 1 point. So are you ready ??

This shuffler game is a part of 30 days kotlin challenge by Google. This app has implemented following concepts of kotlin: 1) Layout concepts 2) Data Binding concepts 3) Fragments 4) Navigation UI This app is the result of curiosity to explore kotlin and in future more features will be added like hint for answers, the words that are hardcoded will be fetched from online dictionary which can give other relevant details of the word like its meaning and how to use that word
